meanings.sent1: The screeching bird woke me up early in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The screeching brakes of the car startled the pedestrians.
meanings.sent3: The screeching cat sounded like a tiny opera singer.
meanings.sent4: The screeching wind outside made the trees dance wildly.
meanings.sent5: The screeching alarm clock was impossible to ignore.

meanings.sent1: The screeching of the microphone hurt my ears.
meanings.sent2: The screeching from the playground could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent3: The screeching of the chalk on the blackboard made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent4: The screeching of the brakes echoed through the empty street.
meanings.sent5: The screeching of the seagulls added to the seaside ambiance.
